headline: Fortive Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend on its Common Stock
summary: EVERETT, Wash., January 28, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.08 per share of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share, payable on March 28, 2025 to common stockholders of record on February 28, 2025. Although Fortive expects to pay dividends on a quarterly basis, any subsequent declaration of dividends, including the amount, the record dates and the payment dates for any such future d
